00016 // The following two constants provide the proper sequence increments for an MSL
00017 //  of 2 mins
00018 const unsigned int SECOND_MULTIPLIER=35791394; // (1s * 2^32) / 120s
00019 const unsigned int MICROSEC_MULTIPLIER=36;     // (1us * 2^32) / 120s
00020 const unsigned int MSL_TIME_SECS=120;          // MSL time is 2 minutes
00021 const unsigned int NUM_SYN_TRIES=8;            // Send SYN 8x before fail (~80secs)
00022 const unsigned int SEQ_LENGTH_MASK=0xFFFFFFFF; // Masks off first 32 bits
00023 
00024 const unsigned int TCP_MAXIMUM_SEGMENT_SIZE=536;

00026 const unsigned int NUM_TCP_STATES=13;

00028 enum eState { CLOSED      = 0,
00029               LISTEN      = 1,
00030               SYN_RCVD    = 2,
00031               SYN_SENT    = 3,
00032               SYN_SENT1   = 4,
00033               ESTABLISHED = 5,
00034               SEND_DATA   = 6,
00035               CLOSE_WAIT  = 7,
00036               FIN_WAIT1   = 8,
00037               CLOSING     = 9,
00038               LAST_ACK    = 10,
00039               FIN_WAIT2   = 11,
00040               TIME_WAIT   = 12 };
